snippet.title: Whispers in the West - 15-second trailer
snippet.description: Whispers in the West is a point-and-click murder mystery game with a twist - it supports online co-op for 1-4 players. The game sets in the far reaches of the Old West. Each story is a unique and intriguing mystery waiting to be solved. To succeed, the players need to work as a team and debate amongst themselves - things may get heated.
